thread.title: Trump no comment on Russia indictments as he heads to Mar-a-Lago

title: Trump no comment on Russia indictments as he heads to Mar-a-Lago
text:
Trump no comment on Russia indictments as he heads to Mar-a-Lago 4:04pm EST - 00:54 
President Trump declined to answer reporters' questions about criminal indictments against 13 Russian nationals Friday, as he departed the White House for a long weekend at his Mar-a-Lago resort. Rough cut (no reporter nattaion). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
President Trump declined to answer reporters' questions about criminal indictments against 13 Russian nationals Friday, as he departed the White House for a long weekend at his Mar-a-Lago resort.
